conclusion: Remainder inadmissible (Article 35-3-b - No significant disadvantage;Continued examination not justified;Case duly considered by a domestic tribunal);Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial (Article 6 - Civil proceedings;Criminal proceedings;Article 6-1 - Reasonable time);Non-pecuniary damage - award
docname: CASE OF GAGLIANO GIORGI v. ITALY - [Armenian Translation] by the COE Human Rights Trust Fund
judges: Françoise Tulkens;Guido Raimondi;Helen Keller;Paulo Pinto De Albuquerque
